title: Naturopath in Kingston WA - Kingston Crossing Wellness Clinic
description: At Kingston Crossing Wellness Clinic in Kingston WA we have a naturopathic doctor. Read about him here and call to schedule an appointment.
cleaned_text: Naturopath in Kingston WA Our [naturopathic doctor in Kingston WA](/) treats a variety of conditions. Respiratory Conditions in Kingston WA - Flu - Sinusitis - Bronchitis - Asthma - Pneumonia Gastrointestinal Conditions - Constipation/Diarrhea - Abdominal Pain - Heartburn (GERD) - Inflammatory Bowel Disease - Crohn's Disease & Ulcerative Colitis - Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS) - Ulcers - Hepatitis Endocrine Disorders - Hashimoto's thyroiditis - Adrenal Insufficiency - Female Hormone Imbalances - Weight Loss - Diabetes Autoimmune Disease - Rheumatoid Arthritis - Lupus (SLE) - Ankylosing Spondylitis - Sjogren's Syndrome - Sarcoidosis Musculoskeletal Conditions - Arthritis - Back Pain - Osteoporosis - Sprains & Strains - Fibromyalgia - TMJ disorders - Chronic pain - Chronic fatigue Cardiovascular Conditions - Hypertension - High Cholesterol - Congestive Heart Failure - Arrhythmias - Anemia - Palpitations Neurological Conditions - Headaches/Migraines - Multiple Sclerosis Dermatological Conditions - Eczema/dermatitis - Acne - Psoriasis Women's Health - Menopausal symptoms - PMS/PMDD - Amenorrhea/Dysmenorrhea - Yeast Infections - Infertility - Fibrocystic Breast Disease - Polycystic Ovary Syndrome (PCOS) - Urinary Tract Infections (UTI) - Men's - Andropause - Benign Prostatic Erectile Dysfunction - Low Libido - Prostatitis Emotional Distress - Insomnia In addition to conventional labwork, I use functional medicine lab testing including: - Adrenal Stress Index (ASI) - Comprehensive Digestive Stool Analysis OFFICE HOURS Monday 9:30am 9:30am - 12:00pm 2:00pm - 6:00pm Saturday & Sunday Closed
